page: ID60005: Quantitative Methods For Decision Making

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Operations research; linear programming, integer programming, introduction to non-linear programming (Kuhn-Tucker conditions), dynamic programming; multicriteria decision making; discrete-event simulation. Forecasting methods: regression methods, time-series forecasting and system dynamics methods. Quality and reliability methods : process control charts, factorial designs, reliability methods for single component, series and parallel systems.
page: ID60005: Quantitative Methods For Decision Making
